| Create custom AuthenticationServicePlugin (conimey [Fj

if (this. handler ull) {
throw new AuthenticationException("Callback handler not set")
}
var userPublicID = this._handler. findUser (username)
if (userPublicID == null) {
throw new FailedLoginException("Bad user name: " + username)
}
var returnCode = this. handler.verifyInternalCredential(userPublicID, password)
if (returnCode == CredentialVerificationResult.5AD USERID) {
throw new FailedLoginException("Bad user name: " + username)
} else if (returnCode == CredentialVerificationResult.#AIT_TO_RETRY) {
throw new MustWaitToRetryException("Still within the login retry delay period")
} else if (returnCode == CredentialVerificationResult.CREDENTIAL_LOCKED) {
throw new LockedCredentialException("The specified user has been locked")
} else if (returnCode CredentialVerificationResult. PASSWORD MISMATCH) {
throw new FailedLoginException("Bad password for user: " + username)
} else {
return userPublicID

override property set Callback (callbacktiandler : AuthenticationServicePluginCallbacktiandler) {
_handler = callbackHandler
}

* The plugin registry exists under

¢ Pre-defined plugins will already have a plugin registry entry
+ Double click an existing entry to edit it
+ For other types of plugins, such as messaging plugins, you may need to create a new registry entry

+ Right click on the registry node and select New > Plugin if you need to create a new registry entry

| SOAP Webservices Authentication plugin Gi

&,—__—f3_-

af eS
Web Service Webservices Authentication
Authentication plugin Service plugin

¢ For web services that require permissions
* Handle the name/password authentication for a user connecting to SOAP web services

* Calls the registered implementation of the Authentication ServicePlugin

+ Never call a Guidewire web service from within the Authentication Service plugin — it will create an
endless loop

¢ Aregistered and enabled version of the plugin is required otherwise web services
are unable to authenticate

| Custom We

set

ot

bservicesAuthenticationServicePlugin [5

package trn.ta.plugin.userauthentication

uses gw.plugin.security.*
uses gw.util.Pair
uses gw.xsd.guidewire.soapheaders.Authentication

class CustomiebservicesAuthenticationPlugin implements WebservicesAuthenticationPlugin {
override function authenticate(context : WebservicesAuthenticationContext) : User {

var user : User = null
var authMethods = new ArrayList<AuthenticationMethod>()

var headersFromEnvelope = context .RequestSoapHeaders
if (headersFromEnvelope != null) {
final var auth = headersFromEnvelope.get$Child (Authentication)
if (auth != null ce fauth.issNil()) {
authMethods.add (new UsernamePasswordAuthenticationMethod() {
protected override property get UsernamePassword() : Pair<String, String> {
return new Pair<String, String>(auth.Username, auth. Password)

Af (JauthMethods.isEmpty()) {
user = authMethods.get (0) .getUser()
}

return user

| Database Authentication plugin Gi

== LL.
Guidewire Database Enterprise Database
application Authentication plugin

¢ Enterprise database connection requires a database username and password as
part of jdbcURL

* database-config.xml in <dbcp-connection-pool /> element
+ Password file
¢ Plugin can supply database authentication credentials for Guidewire database

* Guidewire application requires connection to Guidewire Database

Database Authentication plugin example Gi

1 package trn.ta.plugin.dbauthentication

uses gw.plugin.dbauth.DBAuthenticationPlugin
uses gw.plugin.dbauth.UsernamePasswordPair
uses javax.naming.Context

uses javax.naming.InitialContext

—p> 6 class Jr gin implements DBAuthenticationPlugin {

—pP 10 of override function retrieveUsernameAndPassword(dbName : String) : UsernamePasswordPair {
11 var initCtx = new InitialContext()
12 var envCtx = initCtx.lookup("java:comp/env") as Context
13 var username = envCtx.lookup("jdbc/" + dbName + "/username") as String

var password = envCtx.lookup("jdbc/" + dbName + "/password") as String

return new UsernamePasswordPair(username, password)
